title: Business Analyst
description:
Role: Business Analyst

Experience: 5.1 to 7 Yrs.

Location: Mumbai.

Notice Period: Immediate Joiner

Skills


Excel Knowledge along with VBA and macros
Basic understanding of RDBMS concepts and should be able to write SQL queries.
Good Written and Oral communication skills
Knowledge of IT Asset Management Process
Ability to create the business analysis documents.
Able to work independently using MS Office suite.
